segments.text: I really want to make something for dinner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you going to cook ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I haven't the slightest clue what I'm going to make .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know how to make that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All you need to make it is white rice and some teriyaki beef .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds fairly simple , but how do I cook it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The first and simplest thing you have to do is make some white rice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then you should shred your beef and pour some teriyaki marinade over it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's the next thing I need to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then all you need to do is cook it and enjoy .
segments.speaker: S2
